name: Thriller Bark
description: A massive ship disguised as an island, serving as Gecko Moria's base of operations in the Florian Triangle. It is the largest known pirate ship in the world.

keyEvents.description: The final battle between Luffy and the giant Moria takes place on the deck as dawn approaches
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes a race against time as the rising sun threatens to kill all shadowless victims

keyEvents.description: The mast of Thriller Bark collapses onto Moria after Luffy's Gigant Jet Shell attack
keyEvents.significance: The structural damage to the ship symbolizes Moria's defeat and the end of his reign

keyEvents.description: Buildings collapse as dawn breaks, exposing the Straw Hats to sunlight
keyEvents.significance: The deteriorating structures create additional danger even after Moria's defeat

keyEvents.description: Dawn arrives on Thriller Bark, bringing both salvation and danger
keyEvents.significance: The sunlight represents the end of the nightmare but also the deadline for the shadowless victims

statusChanges.description: Thriller Bark suffers significant structural damage from the battle, with the main mast collapsing and buildings crumbling
